code: import axios from'axios';export var signup=function signup(body){return axios.post('/api/createuser',body);};export var login=function login(creds){return ".concat(btoa(username+':'+password));axios.defaults.headers['Authorization']=authorizationHeaderValue;}else{delete axios.defaults.headers['Authorization'];}};export var createActivity=function createActivity(body){return axios.post('/api/createActivity',body);};export var getActivities=function getActivities(username){var page=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:0;var size=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:2;var path=username?"/api/users/".concat(username,"/activities?page="):"/api/getActivities?page=";return axios.get(path+page);};export var getOldActivities=function getOldActivities(id,username){var path=username?"/api/users/".concat(username,"/activities/").concat(id):"/api/getActivities/".concat(id);return axios.get(path);};export var getNewActivityCount=function getNewActivityCount(id,username){var
